thread.title: Commerce Secretary Wilbur Ross Gains More Sway Over Space Issues

author: Andy Pasztor
title: Commerce Secretary Wilbur Ross Gains More Sway Over Space Issues
text:
COLORADO SPRINGS, Colo.—The Trump administration will appoint the Commerce Secretary to oversee a new approach to preventing hundreds of military and commercial satellites from hitting space debris, Vice President Mike Pence said on Monday.
Commerce Secretary Wilbur Ross will take charge of the nation’s “first comprehensive space traffic management policy,” Mr. Pence said, pending President Donald Trump’s expected approval. The Pentagon now safeguards space traffic.
